I'm a product designer and filmmaker based in Seattle, Washington.

By day, I run product strategy and UX at Goodthings. We're working with our friends at Committee for Children to build apps that help parents be better for their kids.

Before this, I helped rebuild the guest experience at Resy and a bunch of cool stuff at Starbucks.

I spend quite a bit of time enjoying film and working on film projects. A couple summers ago, I followed my friends at Canlis across the country and made a documentary about it. If you're into fancy food and the people who make it, this is your jam.

I occasionally write about my feelings and things you're probably uncomfortable discussing with your mom.

jeremy@jeremypbeasley.com
